Actually, Kyle just joked when he made this one ( at least I hope 
so, especially in his interest =P). However, the idea of using 
egroups for a forum is great. Come to think of it, we could also 
make a new yahoogroup named About NBWRPG... I'll check it out and 
give you news.

However, I want to precise that the discussions that will be held 
will be serious and preferably "fire war-free". Some of you know 
what I mean...

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "shadowess_azogoth" 
<shadowess_azogoth@y...> wrote:
> Oh no. please do not tell me that most of the posts will be poles 
> like this one? Is this a relevent questiong to the rpg?
> 
> Shadowess Azogoth
> 
>
